turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to order some pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, from which pizzeria?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what type of pizzas do you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, do you want extra cheese on all 4?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: any other special requests?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and will you be getting it delivered or dine-in?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, im sorry they don't serve alcohol.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: queso.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you want to add another soda then?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, let me confirm your order for you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: 2 large pepperoni, extra cheese, 2 large sausage, extra cheese, 4 breadstick orders, and 3 cokes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that's fine.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, let me calculate the cost.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Just what I got.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, let me confirm your order for you. Okay.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: it will come out to $85.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your pizzas will be delivered in 20 minutes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: enjoy.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay. Fine.
